dmca.title: TV DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google: Android Market

works.description:
A parody of the famous "Keep Calm and  
Carry On" poster, using a silhouette of a zombie in white on a green  
background with the phrase "Keep Calm Despite Undead Hordes".  Also,
though  
I do not have an android device and can therefore not see what else is in 

this developer's app, it is clear from his screenshots that he is using at
 
least a couple of icons which are also found in our app.  Some of the
icons  
we used are public domain; others were designed by us and are subject to  
copyright.  I would like to ensure that this developer did not copy any of
 
the icons we designed.

Note: We clearly hold no copyright on the "Keep Calm and Carry On" poster 

or the concept of an app which allows users to customize it.  However, the
 
use of the "undead hordes" design is a clear infringement, and could lead 

consumers to believe they are purchasing an app developed by us. In  
addition, we have been developing an Android version of our top-selling
iOS  
app as well.  Finally, given what I can see in the screenshots, I am  
concerned there may be further infringement within this app.
